imageSection.imageAlt: A picture of me with a dumb face

paragraphs.a:
I make stuff™ in JavaScript & Node.js as a hobby. Sometimes it's useful stuff™, sometimes it's just random stuff™ made for fun. Usually the latter though.
My go to for making websites/APIs is Next.js, a React framework. This website is in fact made using that.
paragraphs.b: I like localizing open source projects from English to Italian and vice versa (some projects I've worked on and/or I'm working on are Pretendo Network, ACC, and SPB). I also enjoy listening to music and playing the piano. Lately I've also been trying to learn to play the guitar, with... mixed results.

contact.paragraph: Feel free to reach out to me for anything!
